subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
lead_paragraph: Barry Irwin, the owner of the Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom, said he did not think Shackleford, the Preakness Stakes winner, would be the primary threat in the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
snippet: Barry Irwin, the owner of the Kentucky Derby winner Animal Kingdom, said he did not think Shackleford, the Preakness Stakes winner, would be the primary threat in the Belmont Stakes on Saturday.
